thread.section_title: Empire Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Lincoln Center Location
thread.title_full: Best Lincoln Center Location - Review of Empire Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: E3649VGrobertb
title: Best Lincoln Center Location
text: If you're attending an event at Lincoln Center, the Empire Hotel is the place to stay. Walk out of the hotel, turn left, cross 9th Avenue and you're there. The rooms are comfortable. The staff is friendly. This was our 4th yearly visit and we're already looking forward to our next stay.
